title: Government Spokesperson: Thailand’s overall situation in better shape (Royal Thai Government)
text: ( Source : Royal Thai Government ) The Government Spokesperson revealed that Thailand 's overall situation, as well as political and economic stability, was getting in a better shape with increasing confidence from the global community. The
